title: Should I quit?....
body:
6 years of playing... still haven't been up to even Bronze 3, always getting flamed on. 

Honestly im a good player, (IMO) Im pretty knowledgeable about the game, and keep up on watching LoL and random videos about the game, almost EVERY day.

But like i said, 6 years and nothing to show for it but a shitty stat'ed profile...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
